conbody.p: This section is used for the settings related to Fluentd. The following table describes the parameters of the Fluentd section.

li.p: If you have changed the internal network host identifier, you must ensure that this change is consistent with all the applicable IP address values of sdc_config_data parameter.

row.entry: This parameter defines mapping rules for all the VM other than OAME.
This parameter defines Fluentd configuration template for all the VM other than OAME.
This parameter defines Fluentd configuration values. By default this parameter is set to the OAME internal IP addresses.
This parameter defines Fluentd backup directory. This parameter must be set to /etc/td-agent/plugin.
This parameter defines OAME group name.
This parameter defines the list of ports used by Fluentd plugin.
This parameter defines mapping rules for OAME VMs.
This parameter defines configuration template for OAME VMs.
This parameter defines Fluentd configuration values. By default this parameter is set to the OAME internal IP addresses.
This parameter defines Fluentd out-forward port. The default port is 24224.
This parameter defines Fluentd port. The default port is 8514.
